website_summaries.verdict: Pleasant citrus-based cleaner that works for some automotive, boat, and truck use but not all heavy-duty machinery.
pros: Use it to clean tools as well as autos and boats
cons: It's not a heavy-duty, industrial-grade cleaner as some other product choices are
But it gets the job done at home

customer_reviews.title: WARNING!!  - This product will destroy your car
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT use this product on anything you care about. I used this product on my Porsche 911 wheels, diluted as specified on a cool day in a garage (i.e., no sun or heat to speak of) and it chemically etched my rims within about 30 seconds. Just look at the picture, this chemical etching is dry and smooth to the touch, even though they look to be dripping with grease. They are totally ruined and will need to be replaced at a cost of about $7,000! Yikes!!!! Do not let this happen to you, I don't know what they put in this stuff, but I wouldn't use it on a rusty wagon.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heavy-duty cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is an excellent all-purpose heavy-duty cleaner. Works much better than Simple Green. Use it to remove soot from glass fireplace doors. Also works great to clean water pipes (bongs). Be sure to use gloves though. This stuff will mess up your hands. Has not caused damage to any surfaces that I've used it on (metal, glass, plastic), which is always a plus. I'm sure there is a bulk generic version that's much cheaper, but it lasts so long I don't bother.
customer_reviews.author: CBE

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that worked to remove paint transfer on leather steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: There were 2 spots of what appeared to be some sort of white paint spots on a leather steering wheel that I could not get off and I tried everything including a magic eraser, Megs SD, Citrol, etc. Nothing worked. Out of desperation I tried this with a small nylon scrub brush and it worked! So, this whole bottle already paid for itself using less that 4 squirts! It will always have a place in my arsenal from now on
customer_reviews.author: TheBigOldDog

customer_reviews.title: I love this degreaser
customer_reviews.text: I love this degreaser. I use it for cleaning fender wells, tires, and sometimes rubber floor mats. My only complaint is that in the gallon size, the degreaser literally ate through the container and spilled all over my garage floor. Chemical guys needs to improve their containers to where they can actually handle this stuff. Besides that I love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: IT TOTALLY SUCKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT SUCKS!!! IT MADE MY WINDSHIELD WORSE. KEPT WATERING DOWN. WELL OVER A HOUR TO TRY AND GET IT CLEAN AS THE VIDEO ON YOU TUBE SUGGESTS. MY WINDOWS STILL HAVE STREAKS. DON'T BUY THIS PRODUCT. ALSO IF IT GETS ON ANYTHING SICH AS YOUR DASHBOARD IT STAINS IT AND IT WON'T COME OUT. SO FREAKING PISSED!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Torres

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff but don’t use off label
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it’s meant to do with ease. I’d be very cautious about using this on anything not recommended. It’s got some seriously hardcore ingredients in order for it to do its job, the main one being sodium hydroxide which will eat through anything that’s naturally organic including rubber, skin, bone, wool and who knows what else if left sitting longer than recommended. It’s fantastic at degreasing but results on anything else could be an expensive mistake.
customer_reviews.author: MatthewGB

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Extremely strong.
customer_reviews.text: Please make sure to read the directions. I did not read the directions and just sprayed it all over my engine and engine bay full strength, and it started to take the paint off the core support when I wiped the grease off. It is supposed to be diluted at least 6:1 with water. Make sure you're outside when you use it, as the fumes are awful to inhale. I was outside and it still bothered me just from a little bit floating in the air. Wear old clothes. It discolored my t-shirt. This is seriously strong stuff and I highly recommend it. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE SIGNATURE DEGREASSER.
customer_reviews.text: This Orange Degreaser by Chemical Guys is awesome. I use it to remove dirt and grease/lubricants from my bike chain. It cleans down to bare metal and no residue on wiping down with a clean rag. So far, no indications of any damage to plastic or painted surfaces from over-spray. Wipes clean and smooth every time. Very pleased, and the drivetrain has never looked better.
customer_reviews.author: John M Lapoint

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally made the purchase to use on my engine. Although I have not gotten around to it, I used it for the first time on my rubber mats. I had these mats pretty much as long as I had the car. They were never given any real cleaning other than what the car was does to them. Today I used the orange degreaser on them and they came out brand new. I followed the instruction and it worked perfectly. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BIG MAINE II

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I was duped! Not happy with this cleaner. I used it for basic kitchen job (cleaning old grease) Did not work. I tried to give it a chance, used youtube tutorials to find out how to use it. I used it full strength and diluted. I let it sit on a old jobs and then used a scrubbers and it did not work. It’s not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for bug guts
customer_reviews.text: I use this just for taking the bugs off my jeep. Those monarch butterflies guts stick so hard to the paint and if you leave them on it'll ruin the clear coat. Just spray this stuff on let it sit for 20 seconds and wipe off with a micro fiber towel thats it...don't use those yellow bug sponges they'll scratch the clear coat. Really does the job. Would definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, but beware the dilution instructions!
customer_reviews.text: This product did an amazing job. I used it on two engine bays. Each took 3 minutes to get excellent results. I used the product on cold engines. See before and after of our Touareg’s engine bay that had not been cleaned in 18 months. The instructions say to dilute, but that sort of defeats the purpose of selling the product in a spray bottle. I got around that by spraying the engine bay little with water, immediately applying the degreaser and waiting about 60 seconds before rinsing. The after picture shows a little water on the air filter, but the cleanliness and color is legit. I dried off the engine cover prior to the photo. Looks awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Erskine

customer_reviews.title: Smells like orange scented cleaner and it worked, so it's good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to get a little built-up glaze and brown grime off my tires to prep for higher quality tire shine product application. Diluted about 8:1. No amazing effects like gobs of gunk oozing off or anything like that, but the tires looked pretty clean when I was done, so as far as I can tell it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Hongers

customer_reviews.title: Think carefully before you buy it.
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE!!! This product destroys all metal surfaces. I carefully checked all the reviews before purchasing it. And very disappointed as well as regretful. I don't know how much it will cost me to restore the engine of my scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Dinh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cleaning my bike
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this stuff! I needed something to clean the grease and road dirt off my white road cycle and this is the best thing I've found. I really made a mess the last time I cleaned my chain and ended up with grease all over my bike. I ordered this and used it to clean the frame and what a great job it did. I sprayed in on a sponge and cleaned the entire bike. It looks like new. Now I use this for every cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: LaneyW

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS CONCENTRATE IN A SPRAY BOTTLE
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you have a secondary container to store the extra concentrate! The recommended ratio is as low as 1 part degreaser and 40 parts water. I'm not sure why they're selling it like this. Hence the 1 star for ease of use. It should be sold as an empty bottle and a bottle of concentrate. On a separate note, it certainly works well at removing grease off of a bike chain and having the extra concentrate means it's going to last forever!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: knocked off cooking grease on cabinets like a champ
customer_reviews.text: I had a thick film of cooked on grease on cabinets. Sprayed this miracle liquid on and wiped off with a paper towel. It really destroyed the grease and made clean up a cinch.
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Reader

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work on vegetable based oils
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clean my living area,kitchen and workshop. I live in a "Artists" work loft, so cooking oils, oil paints and all manner of mechanical or lumber based lubricants/adhesives/etc are randomly strewn. I have found this orange degreaser to work only on par with a basic water and soap mixture and below water/TSP. Wish it worked better, but the amount required alongside the time and elbow grease makes it impractical.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R.

customer_reviews.title: I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and does a semi good job. My Camey's engine was heavely coated with oil build up from over the years, so I sprayed it on and waited 45 seconds and rinsed it off. I had to do this 2x but it got a good deal of oil off my engine. It could use a 3rd spray down but it's a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Orange Degreaser
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and environmentally safe. Does a great job on engines, just let it set and wash it off in about ten minutes or so. A little expensive if you do a lot of engine work. I would recommend buying it a bigger container, if you have a lot of cleaning to do. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize that you can dilute this degreaser... used it for the first few times full stregth on the inside of some wheels to clean axle grease... barely had to wipe it off. The grease just melted off! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Bruno B

customer_reviews.title: It Really WERX!
customer_reviews.text: What a Great Product! Kicking myself,as others,forgetting to take b4 and after pics!! Sprayed it on waited about 1 minute, and gentilly sprayed engine with water and voila it's a new 1989 Toyota engine again! It really werx!
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Super strong chemical smell. WARNING!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my tires, OUTSIDE, and it's really strong and kept making me cough. It works sure, but you have to ask, if it's so strong and makes one cough alot, is it worth it????
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Best product I have used yet
customer_reviews.text: Used this to clean up my motor on my truck and my daughters car. Both motors came out great and look brand new again. I didn't dilute it at all. Used it full strength right out of the bottle. Very happy and will buy again soon.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard D Madera

customer_reviews.title: Works very well, powerful, and does not have a strong smell
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, powerful, and does not have a strong smell. I used it for boat vinyl interior with a scrub brush - diluted 4 to 1 My one complaint... This should not be concentrate. It should be usable from the bottle, as is. Why does a product come in a spray bottle & then instruct the user that you MUST dilute the product minimally 4 to 1? Had to use a different spray bottle after all & use this one as concentrate.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Danielson

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-purpose degreaser
customer_reviews.text: Not super-nasty or super-strong like a hard-core foaming engine degreaser, this is a good intermediate product to have around for tougher jobs. It loosened the dirt on my neglected rims and made cleaning them a snap. Pleasant scent too. I couldn't give it 4.5 stars because my bottle's already half empty. I would/probably will buy it again though. Heck I just raised my review to 5 stars. Decided to be generous and grade "on a curve" since it was so close already.
customer_reviews.author: Yet another Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: you wont believe it
customer_reviews.text: saw a video saying if your tire shine isnt working like it use to its because you need to degrease your tires. You won't believe the gunk that came dripping off what i thought was a clean tire after a few sprays.
customer_reviews.author: tomas

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had a nasty greasy jetski(soot, oil, grease) break cleaner failed to get the motor and inside the hull clean but this degreaser worked fantastic!!! Worked great on the oil pan of my truck as well.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Best Degreaser I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: The only thing bad is that it’ll dry your hands for almost a week so don’t handle it without gloves. Other degreasers are worthless or okay at best but I’ll definitely be getting more of this to clean my bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Kraken

customer_reviews.title: What can I say? Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m old school and always used products like Gunk. This stuff works even better, beyond my expectations. I’ve only used it on greased/oiled up engine and engine parts. Took care of removing anything I sprayed it on. Sometimes had to use a brush for the baked on gunk, but worked so well and not harmful to the surface or skin.
customer_reviews.author: kingricker

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Used this stuff today on a Chevy truck motor with 200,000 miles on it. Results were amazing. Wanted to clean off all the grime and grease to do some long overdue maintenance. I sprayed it on directly and let sit for 30 seconds or so. Rinsed it off and was extremely pleased at the final result
customer_reviews.author: J. Steven

customer_reviews.title: Smell makes you sick and the power is not strong not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The smell is too strong and made me fell really uncomfortable. The degreaser is not strong as it smell..
customer_reviews.author: Loyalty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bug and road tar remover.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I use it for taking bugs off the car. Tried all kinds of other stuff with no success. Squirt this on and then easily clean off the bugs with a micro fiber cloth. It also took off some road tar marks. Sprayer kinda wonky and leaves a bit to be desired as it sticks all the time. No big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Good degreaser
customer_reviews.text: Good degreaser. Unclear why it has a sprayer since it’s concentrated and says it shouldn’t be used without mixing but good degreaser none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Ils0crlI

customer_reviews.title: Super strong, but doesn’t cut through oven grease.
customer_reviews.text: Works great at cleaning grout and tough grease in the kitchen/ bathroom. Better than most stuff sold at stores
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hammerl

customer_reviews.title: works great for the undercarriage
customer_reviews.text: Using this as an alternative to the barebones undercarriage product from Chemical Guys. I use it every time I wash my car, I must be careful though to dilute it 10:1 and if i spray it on my rims, i must be sure to leave it on no longer than 1 minute or chemical oxidation will appear. I made the mistake of doing that once but after washing the rim again and scrubbing it with a microfiber mitt, drying it, and applying a sealant, it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: embazle

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to clean my engine a couple times now and it does a great job at removing grease. After diluting this solution as instructed it worked wonders. Would recommend to all! A++++
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy PM

customer_reviews.title: Great product,  but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product , as described , would have given 5 stars , but I've ordered multiple products from them , (which are great) , but the spray bottles are crappy 50% don't work , and the top can't come off , so you have to find a way to get the product out so you don't have to waste your money . Recommend buying the bigger refill bottles and buying your own spray bottle .
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R. HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Engine bay cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I used this to clean the engine bay on my Subaru. It does well on cleaning the plastic and some metal but did not come off the plastic as well as I hoped. I must have done something wrong as it did remove the grime quite well
customer_reviews.author: Joel Adkins

customer_reviews.title: It Works. Quality degreaser
customer_reviews.text: This degreaser is very strong. I pretty much rinsed applied and rinsed and I barley had to scrub anything. Only really thick grimy parts. It got the engine bay very clean with minimal effort. I used it full strength. Will defiantly dilute it next time I use it. A little Pricy but it’s does work!
customer_reviews.author: Stinkyspice

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: The product works exceptionally well. It’s much more powerful than other degreasers I have used. I will buy again... I’m now a big fan. My next purchase will be a larger quantity.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Robbins, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite degreaser i use it on my cars and bikes. It works great it’s tough but gentle enough for most applications.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned caked on grime from my car rims.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean the caked on grime that soap and water couldn't remove. Worked great. I am buying another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: TZR

customer_reviews.title: Powerful degreaser, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I mixed this product 10/1 with water to clean windshield. For nasty bad bug splatters I used a magic eraser to rub product on window. Great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer FD

customer_reviews.title: Its powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I forgot to dilute it as instructed and sprayed it for engine cleaning, and it eats away dirt and grime fast! This thing is effective even with a 20:1 dilute ratio. I will definitely use this more often.
customer_reviews.author: P. Phanphongsa

customer_reviews.title: Great for Brightening Up Fender Wells/Suspension Components
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased a lot of CG products and have been really pleased with them. I used this product to clean and brighten up some very dirty fender wells and suspension components on a high mileage 2001 Toyota Highlander. Like any cleaner, be careful not to leave it on clear coated wheels too long. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: jpwhit

customer_reviews.title: Great tire cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money and works well at 10:1 for degreasing my tires and smells great. Very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: Works well, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 expensive tires brand new from TireRack and they came in very dirty. This product along with some Adam’s tire product made them look like they were supposed to...brand new. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Try it my greasy stove top burners cover. Didn't work to much at all. Not sure how it got so many good reviews. Maybe it works on engines?
customer_reviews.author: Roman Friedrich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Really tough stuff make sure you dilute or it will burn your nostrils. Tskes care of even the most dirtiest of things.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Strong cleaner and good for heavy degreasing on wheels. Need to get a brush and pail to blues as needed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pettengill

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. I have a older diesel pickup that had bad oil leaks and oil got caked onto nearly everything. A lot of products wouldn't even touch it. Even a pressure steam cleaner didn't do much. I used this product(diluted 3:1) and just used our hot water from our garden hose. And it took a lot of it off. WITHOUT SCRUBING ANYTHING AT ALL. Will be buying again once it's used up.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Davis

customer_reviews.title: Leaks but works great
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! Compared to the rim cleaner this stuff saved me a lot of time and effort. It also leaked a bunch like the rim cleaner one but it works so well I had to give it a good review
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Works great diluted on stained sneakers.
customer_reviews.text: Got this product to use on my tires, it was used full strength, worked great. Also worked great to clean my stained up leather sneakers. Only used a small diluted amount for this. Then washed in washing machine. Use rubber gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D.

customer_reviews.title: Works well to remove pine tar off off my car
customer_reviews.text: Used to get dried pine sap off my car. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Darin R. Swan

customer_reviews.title: Power washer helps
customer_reviews.text: Worked AWESOME for me, definitely let it sit for a couple of minutes on your wheels, then power wash it off, made some old wheels look almost brand new, super impressed, even helps with the inner wheel well
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: wear gloves !!  its a de-greaser will dry your hands out !!
customer_reviews.text: Grreat stuff ! removes stains from cloths... not as good as Greased lighting orange but pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: He keeps this on the boat at all times.... I will be fishing off the back and turn around to find him happier than can be, randomly deciding to clean the interior!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Chemical guys CLD
customer_reviews.text: This is a great produce and the sent smells great. After 30 secs, the surface can be wiped clean !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned up the engine very well, but was spilling out a little from the package. Other than that works great and cleans up engine very well
customer_reviews.author: fabian1991

customer_reviews.title: This is the grease/wheel cleaner you've searching for
customer_reviews.text: Full stop! This product works better than that of its peers in every way, including those made "Car" and McGuires. Fully deserves its top Amazon rating.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Spray valve quit
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner worked well for old automotive grease but the valve in the bottle broke. Now I have 2/3 of a very inconvenient cleaner to use.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Works very well on my car. I use it on my rocker panels,wheel well and sometimes my windshield. I bunch of Chemical Guys products and love all of them. I’ll buy again when this runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Forman

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is solid... I should've took before pics.. but I did a brake job and the time were black from brake dust.. this stuff took it right off barely any effort.. you can dilute it but for my purposes didn't need to.. and got plenty to spare
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Harris

customer_reviews.title: Bottom Busted
customer_reviews.text: I had it on my shelf for a week and the bottom busted and leaked all over my shelf. Only used it once before it emptied.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. I had a bad engine I had to degrease so I used it in it’s concentrated form and it worked flawlessly. But you can dilute it if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the video shows it cleaning tire rims with hardly and scrubbing. Misleading video.. nothing special about it. Just another degreaser
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly powerful degreaser
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a 2003 Denali that had a very dirty engine, I diluted the product at about 10:1 and sprayed the complete engine bay with it. I returned fifteen minutes later to spray down with water and was amazed to see an almost showroom clean engine. Great product and a must have for any detailer or anyone wanting an exceptional degreaser
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vaux

customer_reviews.title: Good degreaser and cleaner all around
customer_reviews.text: Got the chance to use today and wow 😮...goood stuff and smells amazing.ty will have to try more of ur stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian R.

customer_reviews.title: Best degreaser I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.text: One to two applications for heavy grease. Worked great on vehicles and small engines.
customer_reviews.author: btroyal

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Homies!
customer_reviews.text: I got more usage out of this than expected. Works good and odor is not too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love chemical guys products
customer_reviews.text: Love chemical guys products. This worked well in cleaning my wheel wells of dirt and oil. I diluted to 6 -1 just to make sure it didn't damage any of the components in that area
customer_reviews.author: Tuan

customer_reviews.title: Clean tires with brush
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. I used with brush and removed dirt from tires.
customer_reviews.author: Ju-Miao Cheng

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: It cuts 5 or 6x with water and still works great! Not only good for engines but works tremendously on coffee pots too
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Huge disappointment. Didn't break down any grease or oil on my truck. Concentration level made no noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: smAxe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this works it beats down all the dirt and grime
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleans everything under the hood.
customer_reviews.text: I have restored a few cars in my time, this is the best product I have ever used to clean the engine and under the hood. Did a really good job on aluminum heads and got the wire harness nice and shiny too.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Arrived nicely sealed, but the interior had a little leak. I don’t care much for that since it was sealed, and expected it anyways, not complaining but making it known it works and is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Mezmo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Will last a long time since it’s not diluted. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well, even better than kerosene on greasy machinery. Be sure to oil after, because bare metal will rust
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Took out lots of oil and crud on my gears and chain easily
customer_reviews.author: omou

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work very well
customer_reviews.text: Had high hopes for this product due to how well other Chemical Guys products work. Unfortunately, it doesn’t not work as well as I hoped. It also left a residue on my rims despite me removing it before it dried on the rims. I will not be using this anyone.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL L

customer_reviews.title: I have used MANY Different degreasers in my life and this one worked the best, especially for the tough caked on auto grease
customer_reviews.text: This worked just as promised. I have used MANY Different degreasers in my life and this one worked the best, especially for the tough caked on auto grease. This left my engine an engine bay looking brand new.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: Melts grease and oil but very potent need to dilute
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best quick detailers there is! Just make sure you use two towels, one to apply and one to buff any streaks. Don't apply in the sun or you will get lots of streaks.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Guys Cleaner - Outstanding !!
customer_reviews.text: Product was accurate .... if fact SUPERB as a cleaner !! Would definitely buy again !!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Burdick

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the best degreaser I have personally used. It smells better than most to. I have used it about 4 or 5 times and have been impressed with it's performance every time.
customer_reviews.author: Glen

customer_reviews.title: It works wonders!!!
customer_reviews.text: Always buy Chemical Guys products! LOVED this product! Cleaned two engine bays and the one in the picture was the dirtiest! The after was jaw dropping! Highly recommend! 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only takes off a layer if grease at a time.
customer_reviews.text: It did the job. But i found myself having to use it multiple times to get all grease off even when its not thick. But it got my job done and got rid of all the grease. Overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: Great product oil and break dust don't stand a chance !
customer_reviews.text: Great product does the job with little ease. Don't forget to mix it with water in a empty spray bottle and you can't just use it right out of the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Esteban

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it’s made for and doesn’t compromise. Worth the extra couple of dollars
customer_reviews.text: Seriously some of the best stuff you can get. Doesn’t make me feel like I’m working with acid. Great scent too.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Very concentrated, we diluted it 3-1. Good degreaser for places that won't let you use harsh solvents.
customer_reviews.author: Chako

customer_reviews.title: Great for wheels
customer_reviews.text: Diluted and sprayed a bit over my wheels and let it sit there. Pleasantly surprised with how much dirt, grime and brake dust was removed in only one pass! Great for making my steel wheels look like new!
customer_reviews.author: Xiao Liang

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It's a little expense but it's worth it. I just spray it on and wash my car. That's it! It turns out perfect each time.
customer_reviews.author: Jochee

customer_reviews.title: very easy to work with, nice smell
customer_reviews.text: This product is very affordable and a great value. I have reordered and will order again
customer_reviews.author: Michael chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my O ring motorcycle chain. Just diluted it to 1/10th the strength
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Clean engine
customer_reviews.text: I love Chemical Guys product.. I used this product to clean my engine and it did a good job of it.
customer_reviews.author: mr hid

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It works well, smells good. Try not to get it on your skin, had to put lotion on my hands for several days because this stuff dried them out like crazy. I won't ding them for it because I should wear the correct protection gear when using the product
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Garza

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: So this product works!!! I just bought this 2015 Axis Boat and the previous owner stored it outside and didn’t really take of the interior. The pictures shown are right after I used this Orange Degreaser. This stuff works really good. Thanks Chemical Guys. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jorden

customer_reviews.title: This works
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! Super easy and goes a long way! I power wash rinsed now my car looks new again.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Guerra

product_meta.title: Chemical Guys CLD_201_16 Signature Series Orange Degreaser (16 oz)
product_meta.description: Size:16 Ounce, (Single Unit)| Color:OrangeChemical Guys Signature Series Orange Degreaser is designed to loosen and emulsify grease, oil, dirt, and grime. The all-new professional grade degreaser is perfect for cleaning engines, machinery, tools, tires, wheels, and floors. Chemical Guys engineered Signature Series Orange Degreaser with the cleaning power of citrus to break down the toughest grease and grime. The multipurpose power of the Signature Series Orange Degreaser is extremely versatile in any situation. Chemical Guys uses professional strength cleaning power to get the job done. Detailing professionals around the world choose Chemical Guys Signature Series Orange Degreaser for the toughest jobs. Chemical Guys Signature Series Orange Degreaser is formulated to remove the toughest grease and grime. The professional strength formula is super concentrated for ultimate versatility. Simply dilute Signature Series Orange Degreaser to the desired ratio and remove nasty dirt, grease, stains, and grime from your car, truck, motorcycle, boat, and even RV. Spray down your car's dirty engine bay to remove years of built-up grime and gunk for a fresh shine. Remove dirt and grime from your tires to restore the original black look. Clean and restore the shine back your wrenches, ratchets, and screwdrivers. Chemical Guys Signature Series Orange Degreaser is great at handling the toughest jobs that other generic degreasers can't handle. The all-new advanced citrus infused formula emulsifies the toughest grease and pulls it from the surface for a clean shine. Signature Series Orange Degreaser is perfect for removing heavy mud, dirt, and grime from your off-road and 4x4 vehicles. The powerful formula is great at cleaning greasy suspension and differential parts leaving every inch of your car or truck looking great all year round. Simply add a few ounces of the Signature Series Orange Degreaser to a bucket of water to mop and clean your dirty shop floor.
feature_bullets: Removes tough grease, grime, dirt and debris
Works great on engines, machinery, tools, tires, rims and undercarriages
Works fast to loosen and emulsify grease, oil, dirt and grime for easy rinse
Super concentrated - can be diluted to desired needs
